SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ViewSubmissions

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewSubmissions
public class ViewSubmissions extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the submissions from the view to the controller. It is a singleton class, meaning there is only one instance of this class throughout the application. The instance can be accessed using the getInstance() method. The View(gui, tui) should control the input.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ViewSubmissions getInstance()
      Gets the instance of the ViewSubmissions.
      Returns:
      The instance of the ViewSubmissions.

    • setController

      public void setController(Controller controller)
      Sets the controller that handles the submissions.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller that handles the submissions.

    • chooseNumberOfPlayers

      public void chooseNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen number of players to the controller. The controller will then check the input.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - The chosen number of players.

    • chooseNickname

      public void chooseNickname(String nickname)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen nickname to the controller.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The chosen nickname.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(Color color)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen color to the controller. The controller will then check the input and ensure the color is unique.
      Parameters:
      color - The chosen color. The color can be RED, BLUE, GREEN, YELLOW.

    • chooseStartingCard

      public void chooseStartingCard(boolean isFacingUp)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen side of the starting card to the controller.
      Parameters:
      isFacingUp - The chosen side of the starting card. The side can be true or false.

    • chooseSecretObjectiveCard

      public void chooseSecretObjectiveCard(int indexCard)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen secret objective card to the controller. The controller will then check the input.
      Parameters:
      indexCard - The index of the chosen secret objective card.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int indexHand, Point position, boolean isFacingUp)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen card to the controller.
      Parameters:
      indexHand - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      position - The position on the table where the card will be placed.
      isFacingUp - The side of the card.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(boolean gold, int onTableOrDeck)
      This method is responsible for sending the chosen card to the controller.
      Parameters:
      gold - A boolean indicating whether the card is gold.
      onTableOrDeck - An integer indicating whether the card is drawn from the table or the deck.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Retrieves the nickname of the client player. This method is used to get the nickname of the player from the controller.
      Returns:
      The nickname of the current player as a String.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String message)
      Send a message from the player to the others
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
